title: Stefanos Tsitsipas Thought About Quitting Tennis
summary: Stefanos Tsitsipas is a tennis player from Greece. In 2025, he had very bad back pain that made him think about stopping his tennis career. He was scared because he could not walk for two days after losing a match at the US Open. Tsitsipas has been a top player before, reaching number three in the world and playing in big finals. Now, he is ranked 36th and has only played a few matches recently. After five weeks of training without pain, he feels better and is excited to play in the United Cup and Australian Open. His goal for 2026 is to finish matches without worrying about his back. He believes he can return to his best level with hard work and care.
